entry.def: A purpose-built building has been specially designed and built for a particular use.

example.ex: The company has recently moved into a new purpose-built factory.
example.tran: 该公司最近搬进了一家专门建造的新工厂。

means.word_mean: 1. designed and constructed to serve a particular purpose
